Expertise in UI and UX development for Mobile/Web, Front End Optimization (FEO), Responsive Web Design (RWD), OOJS, HTML5, CSS Driven Responsive Layouts, W3C standards; Frameworks: jQuery, LESS, JQM(jQuery Mobile), Performance optimization, Cross browser / device debugging techniques.

Experienced in developing and integrating modular and compatible UIs for CMS Applications like Adobe Experience Manager (Day CQ and more with good understanding on end-to-end workflow of these applications.

Familiar with Grunt, Twitter Bootstrap, Modernizr, AngularJS, RequireJS, Integrating, customizing & extending third-party Plugins.
